nodes.text: The Lower Prison Magma Transport was the modern designation for the Rakata transporter that was located in a cave off of the Cells of the Lords of the Infinite in the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis.
The Lower Prison Magma Transport is a Imperial-restricted transporter in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
